thread.title: Indiana HS football playoff prayer event set for Thursday
thread.title_full: Indiana HS football playoff prayer event set for Thursday

title: Indiana HS football playoff prayer event set for Thursday
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Indiana HS football playoff prayer event set for Thursday The second annual Indiana High School Football Playoff Prayer Event will be held at Northview Christian Church in Carmel on Thursday night. Post to Facebook Indiana HS football playoff prayer event set for Thursday The second annual Indiana High School Football Playoff Prayer Event will be held at Northview Christian Church in Carmel on Thursday night. Check out this story on IndyStar.com: http://indy.st/1LLQ6L5 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Indiana HS football playoff prayer event set for Thursday Kyle Neddenriep , kyle.neddenriep@indystar.com 1:34 p.m. EDT October 21, 2015 Buy Photo Dwayne Allen and Hunter Smith will emcee the event, which is in its second year. (Photo: Doug McSchooler / for The Star) Buy Photo 119 CONNECT 22 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The second annual Indiana High School Football Playoff Prayer Event will be held at Northview Christian Church in Carmel on Thursday night. 
All Indiana high school football players and their fathers are invited to attend the event, which attracted a crowd of 500 last year, representing 15 schools. More than 2,000 are expected this year, event producer Todd Melloh said. 
Clayton Jennings, an evangelist and author who was raised in Central Indiana, will serve as the guest speaker. Colts’ tight end Dwayne Allen and former Colts’ punter Hunter Smith will help emcee the event. The team with the most players present will receive a Tony Dungy autographed football. 
All players are encouraged to wear their jerseys. The event begins at 7 p.m. Read or Share this story: http://indy.st/1LLQ6L5 TOP VIDEOS
